name: Bunny Runner (ManeZ)
description:
Bunny Runner is a simple platform game made on phaser that aims to collect the 3 stars that are scattered around the map

-wasd to move

-You can jump on carrots and stars

-press R to restart the level

I developed it for #MyFirstGameJam :Summer2020.

And it´s indeed the first videogame i developed.
